include.label: $LOCALIZE[31080] $PARAM[number]
include.onclick: RunScript(script.skinvariables,run_dialog=select,list=Trailer / Trakt / Wikipedia / Plot / Artwork / UserRating / Versions / Extras / Refresh,separator=' / ',heading=$PARAM[type] $PARAM[number],"executebuiltin=Skin.SetString(DialogInfo.$PARAM[type].Item$PARAM[number],{v})")
